flawed_nl_solution:
Last week Maya read 5 * 300 = <<5*300=15000>>15000 pages of text.
This week she doubled the result, so she read 2 * 15000 = <<2*15000=30000>>30000 pages.
In total Maya read 15000 + 30000 = <<15000+30000=45000>>45000 pages of text.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1500, not 15000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
